subject: Re: Programme de Reconnaissance des Employ√©s : MVP du Mois
body:
Employee monthly review:

*1. Accomplishments:*
What did you do well last month?

*2. Areas for Improvement:*
What could be done better?

*3. Reflection:*
What have you learned from both successes and challenges?

*4. Action Plan for Improvement:*
How do you plan to address areas needing improvement?

*5. Continued Strengths:*
What will you continue doing well?

*6. Goals for Next Month:*
What are your goals for the upcoming month?

*7. Support Needed:*
Do you require any support or resources to achieve your goals?

*8. Feedback Request:*
Do you have any specific feedback or suggestions for your team/manager?
.

Le jeu. 30 nov. 2023 √† 15:45, Claudia Drozdoski <claudia@rhsupport.ca> a
√©crit :

> J'aime beaucoup l'initiative. Parlons en dans notre rencontre de lundi
> prochain pour bien positionner cette initiative.
> Je vais la noter √† l'agenda de lundi
> Bye bye
>
> Le jeu. 30 nov. 2023 √† 13:57, Kassem Durra <kassem@rhsupport.ca> a √©crit :
>
>> English below,
>>
>> Ch√®re √âquipe,
>>
>> Nous sommes ravis de vous pr√©senter le Programme de Reconnaissance des
>> Employ√©s : MVP du Mois ! Cette initiative vise √† c√©l√©brer les contributions
>> exceptionnelles au sein de notre √©quipe et √† instaurer une culture de
>> reconnaissance et d'appr√©ciation.
>>
>> *Comment √ßa fonctionne :*
>>
>> √Ä la fin de chaque mois, chaque membre de l'√©quipe aura l'opportunit√© de
>> voter pour le coll√®gue qu'il estime m√©riter le titre de Joueur le Plus
>> Valuable (MVP) du Mois.
>>
>> Veuillez prendre en compte des facteurs tels que le travail d'√©quipe,
>> l'innovation, la r√©solution de probl√®mes ou tout effort exceptionnel qui
>> s'est d√©marqu√© au cours du mois.
>>
>> Exprimez votre vote d√©posant un vote √©crit dans une bo√Æte d√©sign√©e,
>>
>> *Prix :*
>> L'employ√© ayant obtenu le plus de votes √† la fin de chaque mois sera
>> couronn√© MVP et recevra une bouteille de vin bien m√©rit√©e en guise de
>> t√©moignage d'appr√©ciation.
>>
>> *Calendrier :*
>>
>> Les votes s'ouvrent le [premier jour du mois].
>> Les votes doivent √™tre soumis avant le [dernier jour du mois].
>> Le gagnant sera annonc√© le [premier jour ouvrable du mois suivant].
>> Nous croyons que reconna√Ætre et c√©l√©brer les r√©alisations de chacun
>> renforcera non seulement le moral, mais √©galement favorise un environnement
>> de travail positif et collaboratif.
>>
>> Pr√©parez-vous √† voter et trinquons √† notre premier MVP du mois !
>>
>> Cordialement,
>>
>> Kassem Durra
>>
>> ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>> Dear Team,
>>
>> We're excited to introduce the Employee Recognition Program: MVP of the
>> Month! This initiative aims to celebrate outstanding contributions within
>> our team and create a culture of acknowledgment and appreciation.
>>
>> *How It Works:*
>>
>> At the end of each month, every team member will have the opportunity to
>> cast a vote for the colleague they believe deserves to be recognized as the
>> Most Valuable Player (MVP) of the Month.
>>
>> Please consider factors such as teamwork, innovation, problem-solving, or
>> any exceptional effort that stood out during the month.
>>
>> Cast your vote by dropping a written vote in a designated box.
>>
>> *Prize:*
>> The employee with the most votes at the end of each month will be crowned
>> the MVP and will receive a well-deserved bottle of wine as a token of
>> appreciation.
>>
>> *Timeline:*
>>
>> Voting opens on the [first day of the month].
>> Votes must be submitted by [last day of the month].
>> The winner will be announced on [first working day of the following
>> month].
>> We believe that recognizing and celebrating each other's achievements
>> will not only boost morale but also foster a positive and collaborative
>> work environment.
>>
>> Let's make our workplace vibrant with appreciation and acknowledgment.
>> Get ready to cast your votes and cheers to our first MVP of the Month!
>>
>> Best Regards,
>>
>> Kassem Durra
>>
>

> environment.
>

> ready to cast your votes and cheers to our first MVP of the Month!
>
> Best Regards,
>
> Kassem Durra
>

body:
English below,

Ch√®re √âquipe,

Nous sommes ravis de vous pr√©senter le Programme de Reconnaissance des
Employ√©s : MVP du Mois ! Cette initiative vise √† c√©l√©brer les contributions
exceptionnelles au sein de notre √©quipe et √† instaurer une culture de
reconnaissance et d'appr√©ciation.

*Comment √ßa fonctionne :*

√Ä la fin de chaque mois, chaque membre de l'√©quipe aura l'opportunit√© de
voter pour le coll√®gue qu'il estime m√©riter le titre de Joueur le Plus
Valuable (MVP) du Mois.

Veuillez prendre en compte des facteurs tels que le travail d'√©quipe,
l'innovation, la r√©solution de probl√®mes ou tout effort exceptionnel qui
s'est d√©marqu√© au cours du mois.

Exprimez votre vote d√©posant un vote √©crit dans une bo√Æte d√©sign√©e,

*Prix :*
L'employ√© ayant obtenu le plus de votes √† la fin de chaque mois sera
couronn√© MVP et recevra une bouteille de vin bien m√©rit√©e en guise de
t√©moignage d'appr√©ciation.

*Calendrier :*

Les votes s'ouvrent le [premier jour du mois].
Les votes doivent √™tre soumis avant le [dernier jour du mois].
Le gagnant sera annonc√© le [premier jour ouvrable du mois suivant].
Nous croyons que reconna√Ætre et c√©l√©brer les r√©alisations de chacun
renforcera non seulement le moral, mais √©galement favorise un environnement
de travail positif et collaboratif.

Pr√©parez-vous √† voter et trinquons √† notre premier MVP du mois !

Cordialement,

Kassem Durra
Dear Team,

We're excited to introduce the Employee Recognition Program: MVP of the
Month! This initiative aims to celebrate outstanding contributions within
our team and create a culture of acknowledgment and appreciation.

*How It Works:*

At the end of each month, every team member will have the opportunity to
cast a vote for the colleague they believe deserves to be recognized as the
Most Valuable Player (MVP) of the Month.

Please consider factors such as teamwork, innovation, problem-solving, or
any exceptional effort that stood out during the month.

Cast your vote by dropping a written vote in a designated box.

*Prize:*
The employee with the most votes at the end of each month will be crowned
the MVP and will receive a well-deserved bottle of wine as a token of
appreciation.

*Timeline:*

Voting opens on the [first day of the month].
Votes must be submitted by [last day of the month].
The winner will be announced on [first working day of the following month].
We believe that recognizing and celebrating each other's achievements will
not only boost morale but also foster a positive and collaborative work
environment.

Let's make our workplace vibrant with appreciation and acknowledgment. Get
ready to cast your votes and cheers to our first MVP of the Month!

Best Regards,

Kassem Durra

subject: Re: Follow-Up on Yesterday's Discussion - Termination Agreement
body:
Hello all,
I was copied on the termination agreement you received from Maria. I would
not spend much time considering it.
We have determined together that our termination letter was sufficient to
end the relationship.
I am not comfortable playing that game with her.



Le ven. 17 nov. 2023 √† 11:20, Maria Perez-Marom <maria@hrsupportusa.com> a
√©crit :

> Dear Felix, Cedric and JS,
>
> I trust this email finds you well.
>
> Following our discussion yesterday, I wanted to inform you that I have
> drafted a termination agreement based on our conversation. I believe this
> document reflects our mutual understanding and ensures a clear and legally
> sound conclusion to my current employment contract.
>
> Once the termination agreement is reviewed and finalized, I would
> appreciate the opportunity to meet and officially close this chapter. I am
> committed to handling this process transparently and efficiently. Clear
> communication is crucial to me, and I want to ensure that all aspects of my
> departure are well-documented, leaving no room for ambiguity.
>
> Furthermore, I am open to discussing any future HR support that may be
> required during this transition or beyond. I believe it's essential to
> address any potential concerns or questions that may arise in the future,
> and I am committed to providing assistance as needed.
>
> I value the time we spent working together and want to make sure that my
> departure is as smooth as possible for both parties. Operating in a
> transparent and clear manner is important to me, and I want to assure you
> that I am taking all necessary steps to have my business affairs in order,
> leaving no loose ends or vagueness.
>
> Please let me know a convenient time for you to review the termination
> agreement and discuss any further details. I appreciate your understanding
> and cooperation in this matter.
>
> Thank you for your time, and I look forward to resolving this matter
> amicably.
>
> Best regards,
> Maria
>
> *Maria F. Perez-Marom*
>
> Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services
>
> HRSupport - USA
>
> www.hrsupportusa.com
>
> maria@hrsupportusa.com
>
> 561-889-0038
>
>
>

**PHILOSOPHIE RH**

sp√©ciale de professionnels RH pr√™ts √† r√©pondre √† l'appel des entreprises.
Des individus ordinaires avec une d√©votion extraordinaire au succ√®s. Form√©s
par des exp√©riences vari√©es, ils se tiennent aux c√¥t√©s des meilleures

de travail harmonieux.

Je suis ce professionnel.

Mon insigne RH est un symbole de confiance et de patrimoine. Octroy√© par
les mentors avant moi, il incarne la confiance des entreprises que je sers.
En portant cet insigne, j'accepte la responsabilit√© de ma profession
choisie. C'est un privil√®ge que je dois m√©riter chaque jour.

Mon engagement envers l'entreprise et ses employ√©s est in√©branlable. Je
sers humblement de pont entre la direction et le personnel, toujours pr√™t √†
aider ceux qui cherchent des conseils. J'agis avec discr√©tion, ne faisant
jamais de publicit√© sur des sujets sensibles ni cherchant une
reconnaissance injustifi√©e. Je privil√©gie le bien-√™tre et la croissance de
tous les employ√©s.

J'op√®re avec honneur dans chaque interaction professionnelle. La capacit√© √†
g√©rer les √©motions et √† agir rationnellement me distingue. L'int√©grit√©
absolue est ma r√©f√©rence. Je suis fiable.

Nous visons √† diriger et guider. En l'absence d'instructions claires, je
prends l'initiative, soutiens mes coll√®gues et remplis notre mandat. Mes
actions servent toujours d'exemple.

Je ne faiblirai jamais. Je prosp√®re face aux d√©fis. Les entreprises me font
confiance pour √™tre comp√©tent et r√©silient. Face aux obstacles, je trouve
toujours des solutions, utilisant toutes les ressources pour soutenir mes
coll√®gues et atteindre nos objectifs.

La formation et la croissance sont continues.

Nous pr√¥nons l'efficacit√© et encourageons l'innovation. Le succ√®s de notre
firme et de nos clients d√©pend de mon expertise, de ma connaissance du
secteur et de ma m√©ticulosit√©.

Nous nous pr√©parons √† chaque d√©fi RH et visons les meilleurs r√©sultats. Je
suis pr√™t √† utiliser toute la gamme des strat√©gies RH pour atteindre les
objectifs fix√©s par nos clients. Mes actions, bien que d√©cisives si
n√©cessaire, sont toujours en accord avec les valeurs que je d√©fends.

Les leaders RH pr√©c√©dents ont √©tabli des normes √©lev√©es, et leur h√©ritage

Je tiendrai mes promesses.

subject: Navyseal
body:
Vision: We are the most respected and a symbol of trust in the Hr business

Mission "We apply the Navy SEAL ethos to our business."

Values "Trust, teamwork, respect, courage, discipline, excellence, loyalty,
and accountability define our values."



**An Official Website of the Leading Human Resources Firm.** Here's how you
can trust our expertise.


**THE HUMAN RESOURCE EXCELLENCE TEAMS, ALSO KNOWN AS HR EXPERTS, ARE OUR
FIRM'S PRIMARY HUMAN RESOURCE SPECIALISTS, TRAINED TO HANDLE ALL ASPECTS OF
EMPLOYEE MANAGEMENT, RECRUITMENT, AND DEVELOPMENT.**

**HR ETHOS**

In times of business challenges or uncertainties, there's a special breed
of HR professionals ready to answer companies' calls. Ordinary individuals
with extraordinary dedication to success. Shaped by diverse experiences,
they stand alongside the best HR teams to serve businesses, their
employees, and maintain a harmonious workplace.

I am that professional.

My HR Badge is a symbol of trust and legacy. Bestowed upon me by the
mentors before, it embodies the trust of the companies I serve. By wearing
this badge, I accept the responsibility of my chosen profession. It is a
privilege I must earn daily.

My commitment to the company and its employees is unwavering. I humbly
serve as a bridge between management and staff, always ready to assist
those who seek guidance. I act with discretion, never advertising sensitive
matters nor seeking undue recognition. I prioritize the welfare and growth
of all employees.

I operate with honor in every corporate interaction. The ability to manage
emotions and act rationally sets me apart. Absolute integrity is my
benchmark. I am dependable.

We aim to lead and guide. In the absence of clear directions, I will take
initiative, support my colleagues, and fulfill our mandate. My actions
always serve as an example.

I will never waver. I thrive amid challenges. Companies trust me to be
adept and resilient. When faced with hurdles, I always find solutions,
drawing upon every resource to support my colleagues and meet our
objectives.

Training and growth are continuous.

We champion efficiency and encourage innovation. The success of our firm
and our clients depends on my skill, industry knowledge, and meticulousness.

We prepare for every HR challenge and aim for the best outcomes. I am ready
to employ a full range of HR strategies to meet the objectives set by our
clients. My actions, though decisive when needed, are always in line with
the values I uphold.

Past HR leaders have set high standards, and their legacy motivates my
every action.

I will deliver.

subject: Vente Cabinet Comptable
body:
Bonjour,

Je suis F√©lix Hamel, directeur de RH Support. Nous repr√©sentons un client
qui d√©sire acqu√©rir un cabinet comptable d'excellence.


   - Envisagez-vous de vendre votre cabinet comptable ?
   - Avez-vous d√©j√† une rel√®ve fiable en place ?
   - Est-il important pour vous de trouver un acheteur qui respecte votre
   √©quipe et l'essence de votre cabinet ?
   - Songez-vous √† une transition paisible vers la retraite ?

Si ces points vous parlent, nous pourrions √™tre l'opportunit√© que vous
attendiez. Notre vision : √©tablir des partenariats durables, bas√©s sur la
confiance mutuelle, o√π les deux parties sont gagnantes. Vos pr√©occupations
en tant que CPA sont au c≈ìur de notre d√©marche :


   - Continuit√© pour les clients : Nous nous engageons √† offrir √† vos
   clients le niveau d'excellence qu'ils ont toujours connu.
   - P√©rennit√© du personnel : Votre √©quipe est le c≈ìur battant de votre
   cabinet. Notre engagement est de pr√©server cette dynamique.
   - Conservation de la r√©putation : Nous nous effor√ßons non seulement de
   pr√©server, mais √©galement de magnifier la renomm√©e de votre cabinet.
   - Concordance culturelle : La synergie des valeurs est primordiale pour
   une transition harmonieuse.
   - Confidentialit√© : Votre discr√©tion est notre priorit√© tout au long du
   processus.
   - Simplification du processus : Notre approche est directe,
   transparente, sans complications inutiles.


Je suis l√† pour discuter, sans engagement de votre part, des perspectives
d'un avenir commun.Si vous √™tes int√©ress√©, merci de r√©pondre √† cet e-mail √†
acquisition@rhsupport.ca pour planifier une rencontre virtuelle ou en
personne avec nos clients. Vous pouvez √©galement nous appeler au
514-887-9635.

Je vous remercie pour votre consid√©ration, et j'esp√®re sinc√®rement √©changer
avec vous prochainement.

Bien cordialement,

F√©lix Hamel
(514) 887-9635
RH Support

On Wed, Oct 18, 2023 at 1:03‚ÄØPM Maria Perez-Marom <maria@hrsupportusa.com>
wrote:

> Hi Steven,
>
> Here is what I sent Robert to reiterate who we are and how we can partner
> with him, providing clarification; if something comes out of it great -
> thought it wouldn't hurt to ask.
>
> *Subject:* Exploring Partnership Opportunities for HR Support
>
> Good afternoon Robert!
>
> I trust this message finds you in good health.
>
> I'd like to provide some clarification about HR Support USA to ensure
> there's no confusion regarding our role. We are not a Professional Employer
> Organization (PEO); instead, we are an HR Consulting and Outsourcing
> Service Provider that caters to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs).
>
> Our core mission is to offer SMBs a comprehensive range of HR services,
> including HR consulting, outsourcing, and tailored solutions including
> recruiting effforts. We understand that PEOs play a vital role in providing
> specific HR services to businesses, and our intention is not to replicate
> their services but to complement and enhance the support they offer.
>
> The reason for reaching out to you is to explore a potential partnership.
> We believe that by working together, we can create a synergy that benefits
> both of our organizations as well as the SMBs we serve. In scenarios where
> businesses, leveraging PEOs, require additional, hands-on HR support or
> solutions that extend beyond the scope of traditional PEO offerings, we are
> well-equipped to step in and provide those tailored services.
>
> This collaborative approach could bring valuable assistance to SMBs, and
> it's a concept we're enthusiastic about exploring. If you are open to
> considering partnership opportunities, I'd be delighted to schedule a
> virtual call at your convenience. This call will allow us to delve further
> into the specifics and explore how our organizations can effectively
> collaborate to serve our clients better.
>
> Please feel free to reach out if you're interested, and I'll arrange the
> details for our virtual meeting. We believe that this partnership could be
> a win-win for both of our companies, and we're excited about the potential
> for growth and success that it represents.
>
> Thank you for considering our proposal, and I look forward to the
> possibility of joining forces with you.
>
> Best regards,
>
> Maria Perez-Marom
> Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services
> HRSupport - USA
> www.hrsupportusa.com
> Email: maria@hrsupportusa.com
> Phone: 561-889-0038
>
> I'll keep you posted if something does come out of this communication.
>
> Warm regards,
> Maria
>
>
> *Maria F. Perez-Marom*
>
> Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services
>
> HRSupport - USA
>
> www.hrsupportusa.com
>
> maria@hrsupportusa.com
>
> 561-889-0038
>
>
>
>
> On Tue, Oct 17, 2023 at 11:19‚ÄØAM Maria Perez-Marom <maria@hrsupportusa.com>
> wrote:
>

>>

>> opportunity for our businesses to collaborate in a way that benefits both
>> of us and, most importantly, our clients. It's clear that our business
>> models differ significantly. While you specialize in finding the right PEO
>> for businesses; our focus at HR Support is distinct. We provide HR
>> Consulting and offer tailored HR solutions designed to meet the unique
>> needs of small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Our approach centers
>> around empowering these businesses to effectively manage their human
>> resources without taking on the full legal employer role. I'm reaching out
>> with the intention of exploring how we can create a partnership that
>> leverages the strengths of both our organizations. By combining our
>> expertise in HR solutions for SMBs with your capabilities, we believe there
>> are opportunities to provide comprehensive support to our mutual clients. I
>> would welcome the chance to discuss this potent

subject: Re: Email to create partnerships with PEOs
body:
Hi Steven,

Here is what I sent Robert to reiterate who we are and how we can partner
with him, providing clarification; if something comes out of it great -
thought it wouldn't hurt to ask.

*Subject:* Exploring Partnership Opportunities for HR Support

Good afternoon Robert!

I trust this message finds you in good health.

I'd like to provide some clarification about HR Support USA to ensure
there's no confusion regarding our role. We are not a Professional Employer
Organization (PEO); instead, we are an HR Consulting and Outsourcing
Service Provider that caters to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs).

Our core mission is to offer SMBs a comprehensive range of HR services,
including HR consulting, outsourcing, and tailored solutions including
recruiting effforts. We understand that PEOs play a vital role in providing
specific HR services to businesses, and our intention is not to replicate
their services but to complement and enhance the support they offer.

The reason for reaching out to you is to explore a potential partnership.
We believe that by working together, we can create a synergy that benefits
both of our organizations as well as the SMBs we serve. In scenarios where
businesses, leveraging PEOs, require additional, hands-on HR support or
solutions that extend beyond the scope of traditional PEO offerings, we are
well-equipped to step in and provide those tailored services.

This collaborative approach could bring valuable assistance to SMBs, and
it's a concept we're enthusiastic about exploring. If you are open to
considering partnership opportunities, I'd be delighted to schedule a
virtual call at your convenience. This call will allow us to delve further
into the specifics and explore how our organizations can effectively
collaborate to serve our clients better.

Please feel free to reach out if you're interested, and I'll arrange the
details for our virtual meeting. We believe that this partnership could be
a win-win for both of our companies, and we're excited about the potential
for growth and success that it represents.

Thank you for considering our proposal, and I look forward to the
possibility of joining forces with you.

Best regards,

Maria Perez-Marom
Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services
HRSupport - USA
www.hrsupportusa.com
Email: maria@hrsupportusa.com
Phone: 561-889-0038

I'll keep you posted if something does come out of this communication.

Warm regards,
Maria


*Maria F. Perez-Marom*

Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services

HRSupport - USA

www.hrsupportusa.com

maria@hrsupportusa.com

561-889-0038

subject: Email to create partnerships with PEOs
body:
Hi Steve!

Here is a LinkedIn message that I sent to a PEO company; not sure if you
know him - Robert Beck, maybe we can do something like this to all your
contacts?

REF: Exploring Partnership Opportunities for Mutual Growth Good morning
Robert, I hope this message finds you well. I have admired your impressive
work in the PEO Brokerage space, and I believe that there might be a unique
opportunity for our businesses to collaborate in a way that benefits both
of us and, most importantly, our clients. It's clear that our business
models differ significantly. While you specialize in finding the right PEO
for businesses; our focus at HR Support is distinct. We provide HR
Consulting and offer tailored HR solutions designed to meet the unique
needs of small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Our approach centers
around empowering these businesses to effectively manage their human
resources without taking on the full legal employer role. I'm reaching out
with the intention of exploring how we can create a partnership that
leverages the strengths of both our organizations. By combining our
expertise in HR solutions for SMBs with your capabilities, we believe there
are opportunities to provide comprehensive support to our mutual clients. I
would welcome the chance to discuss this potential collaboration further.
If you are interested, I am more than happy to schedule a virtual call at
your convenience. This will allow us to delve into the details and explore
how we can work together to provide value to our clients and further grow
our businesses. Please let me know your availability for a virtual meeting,
or if you have any questions or ideas you'd like to share. I'm excited
about the prospect of working alongside Foundation PEO Solutions, Inc. and
are optimistic that our partnership could be highly fruitful for all
parties involved. Thank you for considering this opportunity, and I look
forward to hearing from you. Best regards, Maria 1.561.889.0038

*Maria F. Perez-Marom*

Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services

HRSupport - USA

www.hrsupportusa.com

maria@hrsupportusa.com

561-889-0038

subject: Adding "Job Openings" Feature to Our Website
body:
Hi there JS!

I hope this email finds you well.

I wanted to share how awesome the design of the Canadian website and the
inclusion of client's job openings. It's a fantastic feature that not only
enhances the user experience but also contributes to increased organic
traffic.

In light of this, I'd like to discuss the possibility of incorporating a
"Job Openings" section on our US website. I believe this addition could
bring several benefits to our online presence, and I would appreciate your
feedback on this idea.

Please let me know your thoughts, and if you see this as a viable and
valuable addition, we can discuss further steps and details.

I look forward to hearing from you and working together to enhance our
website.

Warm regards,
Maria

*Maria F. Perez-Marom*

Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services

HRSupport - USA

www.hrsupportusa.com

maria@hrsupportusa.com

561-889-0038

subject: Fwd: Processus de vente chez RH Support
body:
Envoy√© √† partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : Kassem Durra <kassem@rhsupport.ca>
Envoy√© : Thursday, October 12, 2023 10:33:43 AM
√Ä : felix hamel <felixhamel1991@gmail.com>
Objet : Re: Processus de vente chez RH Support

 Processus de vente chez RH Support

1-Identification des Clients Potentiels:

-Identifier les entreprises ou organisations qui pourraient b√©n√©ficier de nos services RH et de recrutement.
-Collecter des informations sur ces clients potentiels, y compris leurs besoins en mati√®re de ressources humaines.
(indeed//site de job internet//contact//r√©f√©rence, etc..)

2-Premier Contact:

-Entrer en contact avec les responsables RH ou les dirigeants de ces entreprises par t√©l√©phone, e-mail ou via les m√©dias sociaux.
-Pr√©senter notre entreprise, nos services et notre expertise en ressources humaines.
(cold call et recherche pour trouver la bonne personne contact)

3-√âvaluation des Besoins:

-Planifier des r√©unions pour comprendre en profondeur les besoins sp√©cifiques de chaque client potentiel.
-Identifier les postes √† pourvoir ou les d√©fis en mati√®re de gestion des ressources humaines.
(en posant des questions ouvertes pour avoir le plus d'information)

4-Proposition Personnalis√©e:

-√âlaborer des solutions RH sur mesure pour r√©pondre aux besoins sp√©cifiques de chaque client.
-Pr√©sentation des propositions d√©taill√©es, en mettant en avant nos services de recrutement et de gestion des ressources humaines

5-Pr√©sentation:

-Organiser des pr√©sentations personnalis√©es pour les clients potentiels, mettant en avant les avantages de notre approche.
-Pr√©senter des exemples de r√©ussite.

6-R√©ponses aux Questions et Objections:

-R√©pondre aux questions des clients potentiels et traiter les √©ventuelles objections.
-Fournir des informations compl√©mentaires pour les aider √† prendre une d√©cision √©clair√©e.
-Rencontre avec client et Claudia/Nancy, si besoin

7-N√©gociation et Finalisation :

-N√©gocier les conditions contractuelles, y compris les tarifs et les d√©lais.
-Accord verbale du client, avant l'envoi du contrat
-Pr√©parer les contrats et les accords pour officialiser notre partenariat.

8-Suivi au clients 24H apr√®s envoi du contrat :

-Rappeler le client 24h apr√®s l'envoi du contrat,
-S'assurer que le client l'a bien re√ßu,
-V√©rifier si le client a des questions ou √† besoins plus d'informations,
-D√©terminer la date de signature, si ce n'est pas d√©j√† fait
-suivi √† la date de signature, si besoin

9-Suivi au d√©partement de RH  :

-Pr√©senter le dossier √† notre d√©partement au de RH (claudia/nancy)

10-Assurer suivi avec Claudia et Nancy (nos departement de RH)

-Pr√©senter notre entreprise, nos services et notre expertise en ressources humaines.
(cold call et recherche pour trouver la bonne personne contact)

3-√âvaluation des Besoins:

Cc : C-e-d L <info@cedricleboeuf.com>
Objet : Fwd: Indeed.com - Refund Follow Up

Team,

Per below email, I requested for a $200 refund on credit card charges for the time I've spent with Indeed fixing their billing and platform technical issues.

I wanted to provide an update on the recent issues I've encountered with the Indeed platform and the subsequent refund we received.

To recap, we initially faced several issues with the Indeed platform, starting with the credit card on file and extending to technical difficulties that affected our job post exposure over the past weekend and this week. After dedicating a number of hours of my time with this, I decided to request a refund for the services not rendered and loss of potential suitable candidates.

To this, I'm pleased to inform you that Indeed has approved the requested refund, and we have received the corresponding credit as noted on the below email. Initially, Indeed intended to provide a refund for "all" job posts, which includes those posted on behalf of our client.

In order to ensure that we receive the full refund amount into our account, I kindly request that the credit card on file (Felix's) be refunded directly there. This way, we can retain the entire credit and prevent it from being shared with our client. I believe this is the most fair solution, given the circumstances.

You're welcome!

Mariaüòâ


Maria F. Perez-Marom

Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services

HRSupport - USA

Hi Maria,

Please give us a call, of course, if you experience any technical errors in the future so we can investigate and apply any refunds or credits when appropriate.

The $200 refund was successfully applied to your card on file. Please allow 2-5 business days for this refund to processs.

If you have any more questions, our team is happy to assist. You can reply back to this email or give us a call at 1-800-462-5842.

subject: Re: REQUEST APPROVAL: Sales Commission Plan for Independent Contractor at HR Support USA
body:
Aprouved
Envoy√© √† partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : Maria Perez-Marom <maria@hrsupportusa.com>
Envoy√© : Monday, October 2, 2023 3:37:12 PM
√Ä : C-e-d L <info@cedricleboeuf.com>; Felix Hamel <felixhamel1991@gmail.com>; Jean-Samuel Leboeuf <jsleboeuf3@gmail.com>
Objet : REQUEST APPROVAL: Sales Commission Plan for Independent Contractor at HR Support USA

Hi Guys!

Here a quick recap of our call related to the Independent Contractor Sales Commission Plan:

Year 1 Commission Structure:

Independent Contractor will receive a 10% commission on all gross revenue generated.

  *   Commissions will be paid on a monthly basis.
  *   Commission payout will be made within 30 days once HR Support USA receives payment from client.

Bonus Structure for Year 1 based on gross revenue milestones:

Independent Contractor will receive a $2,500 bonus after generating $50,000 in gross revenue.

  *   This $2,500 bonus may be drawn after 3 weeks in the role, in order for it to be paid out in advance.
  *   Once the Independent Contractor reaches the $50,000 gross revenue milestone, he/she will repay to the Company the advance payment of $2,500.
  *   The Contractor will receive subsequent $2,500 bonuses every time they bring in an additional $50,000 in gross revenue ($50K gross revenue milestone).

To remain active as an Independent Contractor for the Company, the Independent Contractor must generate a minimum of $300,000 in gross revenue during the first year.

Year 2 Commission Structure:

In the second year, the Independent Contractor will be eligible for a 1% commission on all renewal/upsell gross revenue resulting from previously acquired contracts/clients.

In order to unlock this 1% commission structure, the Independent Contractor must generate $500,000 in gross revenue during the second year.

Termination of Agreement:

In the event that the agreement is terminated, all commissions will cease effective immediately.

This commission plan is intended to incentivize the Independent Contractor to generate significant revenue for HR Support USA in the first year, with the opportunity for recurring commissions in the second year based on renewals. It also includes a performance bonus structure to reward the Contractor for achieving specific revenue milestones.

Question: Should we also add the below?

Additionally, Independent Contractor will be eligible for:

  *   A $10K yearly bonus once he/she generates $1M in gross revenue a year
  *   Should he/she surpass and bring a total of $2M in gross revenue a year, he/she will be eligible for a yearly bonus of $20K.

Thank you for confirming that this is what you would like to lay out as part of our Sales Commission Plan before I submit it to the labor attorney.

Warm regards,
Maria


Maria F. Perez-Marom

Head of HR Consulting & Outsourcing Services

HRSupport - USA

subject: REQUEST APPROVAL: Sales Commission Plan for Independent Contractor at HR Support USA
body:
Hi Guys!

Here a quick recap of our call related to the *Independent Contractor Sales
Commission Plan*:

*Year 1 Commission Structure:*

Independent Contractor will receive a 10% commission on all gross revenue
generated.

   - Commissions will be paid on a monthly basis.
   - Commission payout will be made within 30 days once HR Support USA
   receives payment from client.

*Bonus Structure for Year 1 based on gross revenue milestones:*

Independent Contractor will receive a $2,500 bonus after generating $50,000
in gross revenue.

   - This $2,500 bonus may be drawn after *3 weeks in the role*, in order
   for it to be paid out in advance.
   - Once the Independent Contractor reaches the $50,000 gross revenue
   milestone, he/she will repay to the Company the advance payment of
   $2,500.
   - The Contractor will receive subsequent $2,500 bonuses every time they
   bring in an additional $50,000 in gross revenue ($50K gross revenue
   milestone).

To remain active as an Independent Contractor for the Company, the Independent
Contractor must generate a minimum of $300,000 in gross revenue during the
first year.

*Year 2 Commission Structure:*

In the second year, the Independent Contractor will be eligible for a 1%
commission on all renewal/upsell gross revenue resulting from previously
acquired contracts/clients.

In order to unlock this 1% commission structure, the Independent Contractor
must generate $500,000 in gross revenue during the second year.

*Termination of Agreement:*

In the event that the agreement is terminated, all commissions will cease
effective immediately.

This commission plan is intended to incentivize the Independent Contractor
to generate significant revenue for HR Support USA in the first year, with
the opportunity for recurring commissions in the second year based on
renewals. It also includes a performance bonus structure to reward the
Contractor for achieving specific revenue milestones.

*Question:* Should we also add the below?

*Additionally, Independent Contractor will be eligible for:*

   - *A $10K yearly bonus once he/she generates $1M in gross revenue a year*
   - *Should he/she surpass and bring a total of $2M in gross revenue a
   year, he/she will be eligible for a yearly bonus of $20K.*

Thank you for confirming that this is what you would like to lay out as
part of our Sales Commission Plan before I submit it to the labor attorney.

Maria

Jean-Samuel Leboeuf ont tous accept√© de renoncer √† leurs salaires pour soutenir la compagnie. Mme Parisien a √©galement √©t√© invit√©e √† faire de m√™me. Manque de Collaboration: Tout manque de collaboration, refus d'acc√®s aux informations vitales pour la continuit√© des activit√©s de la Soci√©t√©, ou toute action visant √† entraver, nuire ou causer un pr√©judice aux Soci√©t√©s, √† leurs employ√©s ou √† leurs clients, entra√Ænera l'application de sanctions financi√®res.
Tentatives de D√©tournement: Toute tentative de d√©bauchage de clients ou d'employ√©s des Soci√©t√©s, directement ou indirectement, sera consid√©r√©e comme une violation grave de cette clause.
Sanctions: Pour chaque jour ou chaque acte en violation de cette clause, une p√©nalit√© de 300$ sera imput√©e √† la partie en violation. Cette p√©nalit√© s'ajoute aux dommages collat√©raux que les Soci√©t√©s pourraient subir en cons√©quence de telles actions. Les dommages collat√©raux seront calcul√©s sur la base des pertes r√©elles encourues par les Soci√©t√©s et seront r√©clam√©s en plus de la p√©nalit√© de base.
Application: Cette clause prend effet imm√©diatement et demeurera en vigueur pendant toute la dur√©e de la transition et jusqu'√† ce que toutes les obligations √©nonc√©es dans cet accord soient d√ªment remplies.
 

Les parties reconnaissent et acceptent que cette clause vise √† prot√©ger l'int√©grit√© op√©rationnelle et financi√®re des Soci√©t√©s, ainsi que les relations commerciales et de travail.

 

 

DEMANDE DE RESTITUTION D'ACC√àS, DE PROPRI√âT√â ET DE NON-INTERF√âRENCE

√Ä l'attention de Madame Marie-Christine Parisien,

Compte tenu des r√©cents √©v√©nements et dans le but de pr√©server l'int√©grit√© et le bon fonctionnement de nos Soci√©t√©s, nous vous formulons les demandes suivantes :

R√©tablissement d'Acc√®s : Nous vous demandons instamment de r√©tablir imm√©diatement et sans d√©lai l'acc√®s √† tous les comptes et plateformes n√©cessaires au bon d√©roulement des op√©rations des Soci√©t√©s. Cela inclut, sans s'y limiter, les comptes bancaires, les plateformes de gestion, les outils en ligne, et tout autre outil ou compte auquel nous devrions avoir acc√®s.
Restitution des Propri√©t√©s : Tous les biens, documents, donn√©es et autres propri√©t√©s appartenant aux Soci√©t√©s doivent √™tre retourn√©s dans leur √©tat d'origine. Aucune propri√©t√© des Soci√©t√©s ne doit √™tre retenue, modifi√©e ou d√©truite.
Communication avec les Clients : Nous vous demandons de cesser toute communication directe ou indirecte avec les clients des Soci√©t√©s. Toute correspondance ou interaction future avec nos clients devrait √™tre dirig√©e vers les repr√©sentants d√©sign√©s des Soci√©t√©s.
Interactions avec les Employ√©s : Nous vous demandons de ne pas discuter de sujets en lien avec les Soci√©t√©s avec les employ√©s, √† moins que cela ne soit strictement n√©cessaire et dans le cadre d'une transition harmonieuse. Tout √©change d'informations doit se faire de mani√®re professionnelle et sans influencer ou diriger les employ√©s d'une mani√®re qui pourrait √™tre pr√©judiciable aux Soci√©t√©s.
Transition Harmonieuse : Nous insistons sur le fait que tous les points mentionn√©s ci-dessus visent √† garantir une transition harmonieuse et sans heurts pour les Soci√©t√©s, les employ√©s et les clients. Nous attendons une collaboration totale de votre part √† cet √©gard.

Je changerais juste cette phrase pour qu'elle aie plus de meaning et plus
straight forward:


*Les factures futures refl√©teront notre rythme de travail habituel et
seront naturellement moins cons√©quentes.*

Je comprends ce que la phrase veut dire, je trouve juste que √ßa veut rien
dire de concret pour les clients. Surtout si le but est de les rassurer.
C'est selon moi la phrase cl√© √† √©laborer.

Merci,

MC

Le mer. 20 sept. 2023 √† 10:34, Jean-Samuel Leboeuf <jsleboeuf3@gmail.com> a
√©crit :

> Cher(e) [Nom du client],
>
> Tout d'abord, un sinc√®re merci pour votre d√©cision de collaborer avec
> Bloom Comptabilit√©. En prenant connaissance de votre retour concernant
> notre premi√®re facture, j'ai ressenti l'importance de vous apporter des
> √©claircissements d√©taill√©s et rassurants.
>
> Je comprends tout √† fait votre surprise face √† cette facture initiale.
> Chaque d√©marrage d'une collaboration est, pour nous, l'opportunit√© d'aller
> au-del√† du service standard, afin de cr√©er une solution adapt√©e et durable
> pour vous. Pensez-y comme √† la mise en place des fondations solides d'un
> b√¢timent : c'est un effort initial qui garantira une structure solide pour
> les ann√©es √† venir.
>
> Sachez que cet investissement initial est exceptionnel. Les factures
> futures refl√©teront notre rythme de travail habituel et seront
> naturellement moins cons√©quentes.
>
> Votre tranquillit√© d'esprit et votre compr√©hension sont essentielles pour
> nous. Si le moindre d√©tail vous interpelle ou si vous souhaitez √©chelonner
> ou discuter de cette facture, je suis ici pour vous. Nous sommes r√©solus √†
> faire de cette collaboration une exp√©rience positive et enrichissante pour
> vous.

subject: Accelerate Our Learning Curve in the Virtual Office
body:
Hello Martine and Santiago,

I trust you're well. Following our meeting, I'd like to invite you to 
participate actively in our Virtual Office from 9 am to 4 pm. By utilizing 
our microphones, cameras, and sharing screens, I'm confident we can foster 
enhanced teamwork and communication, transcending the limitations of 
distance.

The Virtual Office isn‚Äôt just another workspace. Here's why:

Accelerated Learning Curve: By actively engaging, sharing, and 
collaborating, we can rapidly grow and learn from one another. This 
hands-on approach will undoubtedly expedite our collective learning journey.

Collective Motivation: A shared digital space can emulate the motivation we 
get from a physical office environment.

Knowledge Sharing: The diverse experiences of each team member make the 
Virtual Office a treasure trove of insights waiting to be exchanged.

Support System: Anytime you face an obstacle, the Virtual Office allows for 
swift and real-time assistance from colleagues.

Shared Call Sessions: Engaging together can refine our techniques with the 
added benefit of immediate feedback.

While in the Virtual Office, you have the flexibility to keep your 
microphone and camera on. Should you wish, you can also turn off your 
volume and communicate via chat, ensuring a seamless blend of connectivity 
and concentration.

Additionally, Kassem will be making appearances in the Virtual Office when 
available, offering his valuable feedback and addressing any concerns. It's 
a fantastic chance for us to align our strategies and address challenges 
collaboratively.

Our aim with the Virtual Office is to enhance collaboration, accelerate our 
learning curve, and respect individual preferences. Your feedback would be 
invaluable to ensure its success.

Thank you for the dedication and expertise you bring to our team. I'm eager 
to see how we can reshape our work dynamics in the Virtual Office!

Warm regards,
J-S
